page.syntax: Code_Text as C = post.run_silent(C layoutname [,C master_table_filter [,C transaction_table_filter [,L silent [,* arguments ]]]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of a previously created post operation.

argument.name: master_table_filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". A filter expression that selects records from the master table.

argument.name: transaction_table_filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". A filter expression that selects records from the transaction table.

page.description: Runs a Post operation without displaying any confirmation dialog boxes
page.discussion: The POST.RUN_SILENT() method runs a previously defined post operation. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
